content.detailedDescription:
I live in the mountains of central idaho. this morning, 3/19/10, at approximately 11:20, five f-15 eagle fighters flew over our place (located in a narrow mountain canyon/valley)from south to north. fighter aircraft are not unusual here, as training flights from mountain home a.F.B. are all too frequent. what was unusual was both the number of planes and the flight pattern. normal flight training flight patterns here are east to west or vice-versa, and generally consist of two planes. this morning, they flew from the south to the north, and there were five aircraft rather than two.

at approximately 1300 hours, i heard the fighters again and went outside to look. there were none in view, but the sound of the engines was clearly audible. as i scanned the sky (partly cloudy, surface wind from the west at about 10 m.P.H., temperature 44 degrees) looking north, i noticed something unusual hovering above top of the slope. the approximate distance to the object would have been 300 yards. 

the object was shaped like a previous year, dead "tumble mustard" plant, with multiple "branch-like" protrusions from a central stem pointing upward at approximately 45 degrees. the difference was that this object was effectively white rather than brown, almost to the point of being translucent, nor was there any frost remaining on any plants in the area after 9:00 this morning. further, the object appeared to be between 15-20 feet high and hovering in place about 30 feet above the ground, rather than being pushed to the east by the winds. tumble mustard is 3 feet tall at maturity. this was not a flying weed.

the object began to slowly ascend to the west, then southwest until its position had shifted from the original spot of observation by approximately 90 degrees. this movement took about 30 seconds. it then ascended at a rapid pace virtually straight up, slightly to the west, and disappeared from view after about three seconds. all of this movement was both into the wind and clearly exhibited the gaining of altitude.

upon first sighting the object, i thought probably the same thing anyone else would have. "what the hell is that?" i am about as outdoorsy a person as you can get - hunting, fishing, hiking, gardening, as well as my entire work-life being spent outdoors. i have seen many things blown into the sky by winds, but nothing like this and nothing of such a shape that went against the direction of the wind gaining in elevation the entire time, none the less disappearing from view in mere seconds. truthfully, i'm not very pleased with the whole event and for approximately 15 minutes immediately afterwards, i was just a bit rattled. i cannot logically explain what i saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: A very unusual shape u.F.O. preceeded by f-15 fighter jets

content.detailedDescription:
My husband saw something in the sky for 20-30 min and asked me to wake up and look at it.  i saw something metal like in the sky going up and down and back and forth.  i told him i thought it had to be either a helicopter or a harrier jet and dismissed it.  20 minutes or so went by and then when we started going over the bridge i looked over to the right and there it was..It was the size of my 1300 s.F. house and super shiney silver.  i thought it was a welcome to sc thing, but then noticed htere were no wires holding it up.  i looked at it for a long time before the woods took my view, several minutes, the bridge was long.  it had a very dark black smokey glass top and shiney silver bottom kinda round in shape but with squarish type sides.  i looked for places where the lights could be opened and there were no lines in the metal for openings for lights..It was solid as it can be.  i just found the picture of what i drew 10 yrs ago just last week when i was packing up stuff to move upstairs.  

there was a little red pickup truck on a half moon beach just to the left of the aircraft.  it wasn't spinning, it was a very pretty day with no clouds in the sky.  i looked for places where lights could come out but it was solid metal.  the black glass was high enough that people could have actually have been walking around up there, like a black glass roof on a house, if we ever were to make houses with roofs like that, it'd be cool.  there was a couple on the half-moon beach having a picnic on a blanket behind their truck.  the aircraft actually was just to the right of them and if they'd looked up, i think they'd freaked.  it was just about 75 feet from the bridge and was about 15 feet up above the bridge height so i had a very good clear look at this thing.  i looked for heat waves off the bottom of the aircraft but there was none.  it was so close to me yet i heard nothing.  i could pick the lake and the town off the map if i look at my atlas again...There was only one lake and one bridge it could have been if you need to know those details, i can look them up and provide them.  i can even download the photo i drew of the aircraft.  

people think you are crazy when you tell them, or they ask if you'd been drinking or smoking anything, a few friends of mine (2) over the last 10 yrs have actually said they thought they saw one, but it was dark at night when it happened to them.  mine was in broad daylight and my husband would not stop or let me out to get photos.  he kept on driving, made me so mad!!

thanks'
content.summary: It was sitting over a lake when i was riding over a long long bridge passing through sc to nc.

content.detailedDescription: It had windows so i got my binoculars and saw grey aliens weird thing is the next day there was somthing in my arm were before there was nothing, yet yesterday all i dii was look at the sky for planes 'cause i used to live next to a base.
content.summary: The u.F.O. was about 100 feet wide, smooth, no edges

content.detailedDescription:
Original report was lost after an error in the form three times, this is a shorter version.

in my driveway working on my pickup truck, noticed object overhead because i routinely keep an eye on the sky due to the many sightings i have experienced.

a light colored object with an irregular shape was floating in a straight line against the light breeze. it was moving slowly at low altitude, made some s-turns, then vanished. it did not travel off out of sight, did not descend or ascend, it just vanished.

at first i thought it could be a balloon or piece of paper, but decided it wasn't due to it moving against the light breeze and it's straight flight path before making the s-turns.

i wanted to run and get binoculars but decided to stay put, had kept my camera in the car but my wife had just left in the car. the sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds.
content.summary: Light colored object with irregular shape, floated overhead, made s-turns, then vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
Observed what appeared to be the moon... but the bottom was lit up like a "smile " warm yellow shifting to orange and red over a 35 minute span moving nw at about 20 mph before disappearing below the horizon...
3 witnesses...Not including myself.. 3-18-2010  mesquite texas

as big as the full moon initially and observed( thought ) to be so until motion was noticed over a 35 minute period moving nw... and logic kicked in that the moon does not wax and wane from top to bottom...

cheshire cat smile best describes its appearance, but the darker shadow above the smile indicated a full circle obviously darker than the background sky color... complete circle... very large...
observed a small, but..Long wispy white cloud moving below it from left to right for a period of about 7 seconds.. appeared much like steam.. but in a straight line under the object,  moving from left to right.. only once..

altitude approximated at 700 feet plus or minus  , and the size was too big to cover with a thumb outstretched when it disappeared below the horizon..

initial color was what would be expected from the moon...  yellow and warm.. shifting slowly to orange and then red over a 35 minute time frame..

very slow moving.. but covered approximately  5 miles over 35 minutes.. moving north west.. not always in a completely straight line.

directly over i-30 e and w bound lanes and gus thompson road... moving towards nwhy and easton before disappearing behind trees and below the horizon... 

object definitely moved left or west before  disappearing behind the trees because a light pole was between me and it and i could see when it was centered and when it was more on the left of the pole...

girlfriend noticed a bright dot what she thought was a star initially upon the very first moments of observation , under the object on the left side... by the time i got out of the car passenger seat... the dot or star had disappeared.. approximately 20 seconds later...

the white cloud appeared about 12 minutes later and rapidly dissipated in  a few seconds after moving from left to right under the object..

we all walked as far as we could down the parking lot to watch it go to the horizon , until we were stopped by a wooden fence, which we climbed on to to look over for the last 5 to 7 minutes of the sighting...

object was too big to cover with a thumb at arms length when it was furthest from us...
when it was closer to us.. it was as big as the full moon... circle shape intact, but with the smile under it... not on the rt.Side as the moon would appear...At this time of the cycle..

the moon also does not "set" in 35 minutes at 10:00 pm to 10:35 pm in dallas texas...

3 other witnesses , not including myself..

it was actually beautiful at first... thinking it was the moon... until we realized it was moving.. and logic started kicking in... that the moon does not do that.... especially with the smile underneath... not on the side.. and shifting colors...

now to answer the questions...
1. in the parking lot changing a thermostat on a car.. just move to a dry parking spot to check for leaks..
2.First noticed the object thinking it wa sa beautiful moon.. with a big cat smile.. and hugged to it thinking it was beautiful.. actually twice before we realize it wasn't the moon...
3.We thought it was the moon... but not like we had ever seen before.. because it was lit  or smiling under it.
4.Round, as big as the full moon, but like an eclipse where you could see the darker circle above it.. like 5/8 darker and 3/8 lit on bottom... yellow like what you would expect the moon to look like.
at first we did not notice the movement... looking for leaks under the car and picking up tools.. job was completed...It took several minutes for it to dawn on us that it had moved from where it was .. because we went to look at it a 3rd time and it was out of sight and we had to walk to see it again.. in a very few short minutes...  we thought we had lost it until we got to the wooden fence and looked over it.. and saw it again nearing the horizon line ( ie  getting lower) and shifting colors to orange and them finally red   very slowly  smooth color shift.
5. feelings and emotions... disbelief... second guessing... what was it what did we see.. where did it go.. and then reacquired it  for the final few minutes when we walked the length of the parking lot to the fence... approximately 400 to 500 yards further than where we were initially..
actions... pure observation.. amazement... discussion. comparing what we all saw  ( 4 of us ) making sure we were all awake and seeing the same things... we watched it until it was no longer there... and the sky where it was lit up slightly brighter and white where it would have gone.. this lighter area lasted for several minutes  until it faded away also after the object was no longer visible..

much discussion in the parking lot during and after the incident .. approximately 30 minutes or more discussing it and what to do about it..

we even retraced out steps .. where we first saw it, and walked the 400 yards again back to the fence to see if the sky was still white where it disappeared... it was not...

after the sighting.... a mix of 'excitement' and 'who is gonna believe this'  feeling...  and how can we find out if more people saw it...

it was directly over a interstate highway full of traffic in both directions  moving slow for at least 5 minutes or more...

6. lost sight of the object as it got lower to the horizon and much further from us.. approximately 5 miles or so away.. we watched it go behind some trees as its shifting to red color and the smile was getting smaller and  as it went behind the light post... it was centered on the light post and moved to the left of the post right before disappearing from our sight lines on top of the wooden fence... you could see the tree branches in between us and the object as it moved slightly left or west  and we lost sight of it..  immediately after we lost visual... the horizon sky around where the object was lit up white  .. like a baseball stadium light haze.. and this change was immediately noticed and commented on..  after we talked about it there for 10 minutes and started walking back taking about it.. we decided to go back again and double check the white in the sky to see if it was still there... and it was not.. that was 10:35 pm 3-18-2010
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Moon shaped large cheshire cat smile moving 20 mph nw shifting colors.

content.detailedDescription:
Ok, last night at 1:00am both my friend and i were talking and admiring the stars in the middle of my college campus when we thought we saw a shooting star becasue we saw two small cresent lines of light. it was not shooting star. we saw what looked like a circular black object comprised either of one or two full circles which either reflected or emmeted dim light on its two edges in the cresent shap. the light emmeted was on two of the edges symetrical to each other in a cresent shape. 

the thing flew over us very low and close probablly 4 stories up in a perfect straight line not moving up or down but stayed on a straight path. it made no sound what so ever. it also moved some what fast but slowly enough for us to see it for a few seconds before it seemed to disapear rather than fade into the distance.

we saw this three times within a 45 min period. the first time it flew over us from south to north, 15 min later we were looking at the stars again admiring them and then we noticed it move from west to east and the same thing happened. by that time we were looking for it again. the last time it happened within 5 min after the second time goign once more from south to north but over a couple yards to the west from where we were and it was higher ( we knew this becasue what we could see was smaller and it moved slower).

we were not scared by it but rather suprised and curious towards what it could be. 

my friend acutally just saw it again tonight, same things occured, moving south to north practically over her.
content.summary: Two black circles with dim cresent shaped light either emmitted or reflected on opposite symmetrical edges

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted my report earlier this week and can be found in mufon's database.  but i wanted to attach two new photos.  the first one is a closer crop of the white, glowing object previously posted.  

the second shot was taken in the same place as the first, but shows...An energy field, morphing? the glowing white object did seem to change shape when i looked at it through my binoculars.  i took 20 photos of the white glowing object from two different angles, but the jpeg numbered p1030155000 shows a very unusual form.  in looking back at my photos, i see the photo right before p103155000 and after, show the white glowing object. so it's a mystery as to what the unusual form is. i have a high-quality digital camera, i'm a nature photographer, and there were no clouds in the sky.
content.summary: Two photos of object observed on 3/14/2010  pasadena, ca

content.detailedDescription:
My friends eric, and genesis were getting off of work thurs. pm. in the parking lot we saw a bright orange light with same color streak trailing behind it. the object was over the bay, it made no sound. it was very bright lasting about 30 sec. then it completly disappeared. then reappeared about 30 sec. later in the same location but was moving in a upwards arc. this time lasting about 40sec. then disappeared. 
two more times same occurance, same duration. and no sound and no other signs of anything after the light went out. i recorded the incident on my cell phone which i will upload tommorrow. the people that saw the object could not understand or think what the object could of been.
content.summary: Bright orb with a streak of fire or light behind it.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of march 17th at 7:30 myself and two others were out looking at the sky when we noticed a bright orb peek up over the horizon directly in front of us it was bright white and at arms length it was the size of a pea. i got out my night vision goggles and looked through them. off to the right of it there was another orb that hung in the air and swayed back and forth in a swooping motion about a half inch on each side from the point where it was stationary. as it was doing that another orb came from above it and moved into position above the first orb and right next to a dimmer one over the horizon. they made a triangle. as we watched them they all twinkled at different times. it looked to me like they were communicating with one another.

at 8:50 paula pointed out two orbs to our imiediate right. one was amber and the other red. the amber orb was in front of the red orb and they were hovering in the same spot.As i positioned myself for a better look they started moving in a straight line accross the sky, as they moved they got closer together. they made a right hand swooping turn and became one amber colored orb. we watched them until they dissapeared in the direction of the ocean.

we turned our attention back to the triangle formation and noticed that the orb that moved into position to make the triangle was moving up higher in the sky. this made the triangle look bigger. we also noticed that the orb right next to it followed it. we watched it for awhile longer and decided to go home for a bathroom break and to get something to drink.

 at 10:00 we went back out to the place where we had seen the orbs and the triangle was still there. we noticed that it moved again. the top orb moved down and made the triangle look small. the orb that was dimmer was still right along side of it, they were still twinkling as if communicating. at this point i looked through the night vision goggles again and after a minute or two i noticed the same amber orb moving back into view from the direction we last saw it,(comming from the direction of the ocean). it was moving in a straight line to the immiediate right of where we were. i followed it and saw it drop a red orb out from underneath it. as they moved across the sky the amber orb slowly pulled away from the red orb, they were moving away from us. we told paula to flash her headlights at it to see if we would get a response. when she did the red orb stopped in its tracks and started going back in the same direction it had come in a seconds time. the amber orb stopped ond hovered until paula beamed her high powered laser light up into the sky next to it. when she did it came straight towards us and flew right over us. it looked like a cluster of twinkling amber lights, then when it passed us it looked like a triangle craft. it had four amber lights in a row across the back and norrowed to one red light in the front. we stood where we were for about 45 seconds then decided to move back down the road.

 when we stopped we looked at the triangle formation and saw that all four of the orbs were moving in and out. the formation was getting smaller than bigger, still with the dimmer orb next to the highest one. i decided to look through the night vision goggles again and when i did i saw an orb to the left of the triangle which was the same direction the amber and red orb went. it was flashing, all of a sudden it flashed very bright,so bright that lit up the sky around it and the night vision goggles. 

the very next morning we noticed that there was a report of the same thing flying over nevada. the pictures that were taken over nevada were the same things we had seen in california.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seven ufo's,three witnesses,four hours

content.detailedDescription: Myself and 3 other men were cleaning up a lawn for spring, there had been a lot of geese flying overhead in the morning and i was looking up often to locate flocks.  as i was scanning the sky i noticed a very bright light that was moving forward and reversing directions to fly back where it was just at and also, hovering.  it was moving in smooth fluid motions, not in a jerky manner. the flash from this object was very bright and constant.  we were watching this object for a couple of minutes as it was moving about the sky.  all of a sudden, we noticed another bright light in the sky fairly close to the first one sighted.  the second object seemed to be moving in a circular or looping motion.  the four of us continued watching these objects for another minute or so until both objects were either to far to see them any longer or they disappeared/vanished.  we did not see the second object moving towards the first object at all during this incident, it seemed to just appear close to it. when i returned home later in the day i tried to duplicate the brightness of the steady "flash" from the objects, i put a piece of aluminum foil under my overhead kitchen light with the shiny side towards the light bulb to reflect the light.  even that was not as bright as the objects we saw.This incident occurred on 3-18-2010 at about 10:00 am
content.summary: Myself and 3 other men saw 2 unexplained "lights" in the sky that flew around and were silent.

content.detailedDescription: 3/18/2010.  facing west, mars on left, pollux in center, and castor on right.  how pretty!  until castor started drifting away, then made u-turns and little circles, all within a degree of where "castor" is suppose to be.  then it returns to its spot.  after about a minute, it starts moving around again.  different directions, different turns and patterns each time, but always returning to pretend to be a star for 30-60 seconds, then take off again.  sometimes slowly and sometimes quickly.  with pollux right there, it's movement is quite obvious.  i watched it do this for 2 hours that first night.  i've been watching it every night since then, about 2 weeks.  got the neighbors to see it too.  why is no one else noticing this but us?  the whole globe can see it with the naked eye!  nothing in the news or internet.  what's going on?  someone just go outside and look at it, and film it.  it's there every night and all night.
content.summary: "castor" is moving around and has been for weeks.

content.detailedDescription: I was just taking pictures of the sunset when i noticed what appeared to be a descending cloud high in the sky.  i knew that it could not be a cloud because once it was low enough it began to glow perhaps from the sun's rays in the background. i at that point took another picture of it as it was positioned in another area of downtown or perhaps it was another object. in any event it was no longer ciruclar. it was now l shaped.
content.summary: Circular object cloud like that became l shaped. or perhaps 2 objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south bound on lewis turner blvd just north of fort walton beach, fl with a close friend of mine. we were actually looking for deer to see if they were stirring because the evening was rather cold. as we were driving along we both looked up and saw the same thing: a red object -spherical appeared - in the sky over the gulf of mexico (must have been over the water given the distance), slowly descended at about a 45 degree angle, then suddenly rocketed to the earth. two more objects followed doing the exact same thing.

i immediately pulled over and both of us got out of the truck to observe the sky for aircraft. specifically an ac-130 gunship, an apache longbow (ah-60), or other fighter aircraft. this area is home to eglin afb and hurlburt field afsoc (air force special operations command) and there are many exercises the military performs nightly. i was thinking it was a 105 howitzer round from an ac-130 gunship but when i searched the sky i saw nothing. i know these aircraft can operate blacked out but it just didnt seem like that type of aircraft. my friend is a few years older than me but weve both lived here all our lives and are very familiar with the military aircraft around here and their operations. it should be noted that the night was absolutely clear and it was nearly full moon.

approximately fifteen minutes later i was driving down the exact same road and noticed aircraft occupying what appeared to be the general airspace in which the sighting occured.

i found out two days later from my friend that an article was published in the local news. i did some homework and the following is the website of the article, as well as, an email thread featuring me and a seperate eyewitness that was interviewed by the local newspaper the northwest florida daily news:


http://www.Nwfdailynews.Com/news/test-26225-base-objects.Html


from: me
to: eyewitness
subject: re: mona from daily new gave your email
date: thu, 4 mar 2010 12:12:58 -0600

hey *******
 
im not sure if you saw the description of what i saw that was sent to mona but i find it interesting that you saw something green as opposed to what i saw. i know what flares look like and im pretty sure what you saw (and me for that matter) wasnt a flare. the objects i saw slowly descended to the ground/water at about a 45 degree angle, then suddenly rocketed with no trail of any kind. im not ruling out that the whole thing may have been some weapons exercise on base using some technology that the public knows nothing about for reasons involving national security but it was weird nonetheless. 
 
and yes i wish i had a camera. i saw something strange on my way to the airport in pensacola around 0400 last summer too. 
 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
date: tue, 2 mar 2010 18:02:13 -0800
from: eyewitness
subject: mona from daily new gave your email
to: me


hi mr. me,
 
mona moore from the daily news said you would like to talk to me about the lights you saw in the sky.  i was the one that saw the big bright green light fall from the sky.  they said it was a flare from base, but i do not believe that!  we live in valparaiso, but we don't live that close to base to see that big of a flare.  this fell at an angle and was really big, it was quite creapy. its one of those times you really wish you would have had a camera, ya know.  i was told that i would see more of these "flares" thoughout the month, but i have not seen anymore since that night. 
 
thanks,
eyewitness
content.summary: Three red orbs appear one at a time.

content.detailedDescription:
Wife and i observed object above wooded hilltop on east side of ny rt16 while driving south on ny rt 16.
object was silver/white in color with slightly darker horzontal line running entire length. ends of object were rounded.
object appeared totally motionless perhaps 200-300 ft above hilltop.
distance between our vehicle (road) and hilltop is about 3000 linear ft.
i would guess that the object's dimensions were perhaps 15-20 feet in height and 100 feet in length.

there were no clouds in the sky, and the object appeared to be solid and constant against blue sky.

at first i thought it was perhaps some type of ballon, but it was totally motionless on breezy day.

we drove on, i was driving but my wife kept constant visual on object until we passed a grove of trees near road which obscured her vision for 10 seconds. after we cleared tree obstruction, object was gone.
content.summary: Motionless airborne cigar shaped object above hilltop.

content.detailedDescription:
Sever storm was approaching when a large opening formed in the clouds formed allowing the sun to shine through. i thought nothing of it. in fact it took several looks at the photos while zooming in to notice this.
i don't remember exactly when the photo was taken. i do remember however that is was taken in 2009. i did not see this object when looking directly at the cloud formation. i' not sure if it is another part of the cloud or something else. i just thought i make you folks aware that this is not the first photo of something unusual in the same general area of downtown kansas city.  i will submit them also.
content.summary: Was taking photos of cloud formation for my computer wallpaper and notice this after loading to comptuer.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my deck looking up at the stars, and i seen an object very high in the sky a small non blinking white light move from south east to north west (over our house), didn't think much of it because we can see the space station and satellites move across the sky at times. about 5 min or less another one traveled in the same direction as the first only all of a sudden the tiny white light pulsed into a bright white light that surrounded the object and made it look 5 times the size it was before, then just as quickly it went back to normal, then about 5 seconds later it did it again, after that it just kept moving across the sky. i thought it very strange because i've been a sky watcher for 45 yrs and have never seen anything like this. do you know if anything was reported as something maybe exploding in space? because that's what it reminded me of an explosion, you get the first tiny pulse of light before the big explosion of light. it wasn't a shooting star i know that for sure. it reminded me of the tiny white lights i have seen on some of the ufo video's.
i felt excited about it because i had witnessed something i had never seen before, and i have seen other things i couldn't explain before last night. i got up and looked on the internet this morning to see if they were reporting something exploding in space but there was nothing.
content.summary: White light moving across sky that pulsed or exploded.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 15, my wife and i had just visited the little a le inn on highway 375 in rachel nevada. we left and drove back down 375 and pulled off the road just about a mile past mailbox rd. i believe the time may have been approximately 9:00-10:00 p.M. (pst). in one of the videos my wife mentions 12:00 central time; this was the end of the sighting. i parked the vehicle at more or less a forty-five degree angle to the road with the headlights pointed towards the glow of las vegas in the sky. this glow also illuminated the mountains and landscape (silhouette etc.). 
	we had pulled off the road to see the stars in the remote sky; we were not there to catch a sighting (13 years married with no break from the kids-type trip). we were in a hurry to get back to vegas but decided to stop along 375. we initially left the car running and lights on with my wife sitting in the passenger seat. i left the car and came around to her side and proceeded to watch the horizon. once we both saw how many stars there was i told her to turn off the car and step out with me. we had both been standing there for just a few minutes trying to get both the digital cameras and the video camera to pick up what we saw. just then i noticed a bright object (not a shooting star) high up in the sky headed towards vegas. 
	this object was very small or very high but did not exhibit normal characteristics of a plane. there were no flashing strobes or sound from engines etc. this object being small, and disappearing quickly, did not really grab my attention. however, moments later from the same direction the object disappeared from came two lights flashing. they seemed motionless and as if they were affixed to each other. in other words it seemed that they were attached by a bar or direct line etc. they flashed for a while before i even considered pointing the camera at them. there are many cattle crossing lights of similar color along 375. it finally dawned on me that those lights had to be miles away and could not possibly be the same type of lights; these lights were much brighter and intense. 
	i pointed the video camera at the objects and could not pick them up until i turned on night shot. the two larger lights were very visible; in addition to this were two other smaller lights that could not be seen with the naked eye. we watched these objects move from left to right going in the direction of rachel. as the two primary objects (po) moved in this direction you could see other smaller lights moving around them. they would zip from one point to another. as they shot away their illumination would dim. in all probability, there were probably more objects out there than we captured or even saw. i based this on the fact that after watching the video, you can see objects you could not see with the naked eye.  
the po traveled from the direction of vegas until they were almost perpendicular with 375 before we lost sight of them. we waited for a few more minutes and then decided to leave. we had only gone about a mile or two when my wife screamed ���there they are again���. this time the po were only a few miles from us (i am guessing about this, their contrast in the night sky made this hard to tell but they were definitely very close to us).  in the video i try to use the ground as both a reference and to help make the camera focus as it should. as you will see in the video, based on the ground etc. it seems that they were right on top of us but i could not figure out why we were not being dowsed by the light. also, i did not see any report of this light on the ground. it was as if the light did not travel or radiate like normal lights. this was very strange for something so bright and intense.
the po made very slow movements. the additional smaller objects seemed to jet around the larger ones and were more agile.  in one of the videos i think i see something like electricity or sparks coming from the po. now the strangest thing was that the po seemed to merge with each other right before they ���blinked��� off or out. also, strange is that i heard my wife say they are gone but she says this at least a second or two before they ���blink��� out again on the camera (not sure why there was a delay between her eyes and the camera). in the stills there seems to be a structure present.  
as far as feelings went, i think we were just in amazement of the objects. when they reappeared closer to us the second time i think we were both a little frightened. it seemed to be checking us out. we got a little more worried about the remote location and the fact that there were other objects moving around the po. i do believe that if we stayed there, the objects would have come closer. i had no feeling whatsoever that the event was over with when we left. these objects were clearly doing something related to that general locale. we decided to leave based on the fact that each time the lights went off, they came back on closer. 

i am not sure how to answer the radio button at the bottom of this screen. what third parties are you referring to?  all i am really seeking is if someone knows what these images are and just how close they were to us. i will submit the videos after speaking to someone in person via phone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Balls of light, fire or amber colored, disappeared and reappeared getting closer to us

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work around midnight, totally sober, saw huge sphere up in sky above the coquille river valley to my right.  i didn't believe my eyes, so i slowed down almost to a stop and looked some more until i believed my eyes.  the rim around the center was parallel to the ground like the thing had a top and bottom.  other than the rim around the center there were no other lines or markings on the sphere.  it was beautiful.  whatever it was made of gave off light, the whole sphere.  it seemed to be about where a small airplane would fly overhead, and it was completely still.  since it was the middle of the night and i was the only vehicle on the road, i decided that i needed to get out of there just in case.  i went home.....No lost time or anything.  now i am very curious.  most people think i'm crazy or a liar so i havn't reported it until now.
content.summary: Effervescent sphere with rim around center holding perfectly still in sky about 1000 ft up

content.detailedDescription: Was walking in my apartment approx. 8:30pm after a walk with girlfriend. noticed something when was walking in the skys above. what seemed to be some type of glowing craft i would assume, but could not make out edges or anything just seemed to be a glowing object pretty high up. was an extremely clear night, not a cloud in the sky! first thing i looked for was blinking markers but there was none, which made me quite interested in it. wasnt moving very fast at all. then proceeded to go inside. realizing i had to get something from car went back out a second later. i looked up and it was still there traveling at same speed. was very bright white... as i starred at it crossing overhead, it was very weird once again, there was no marker lights. the craziest thing happened it slowly disappeared into thin air! unlike anything i've ever seen on such a clear night too with no clouds. no sound either! almost like it knew i was starring at it then cloaked!
content.summary: Orb like ufo

content.detailedDescription: Asleep in bed when i was woken up by a very bright, round white light shining right in my face.  it hurt my eyes to look at it. i then turned on my other side so i would'nt have to. i don't remember any sound coming from it.I remember making a mental note to myself that it was'nt one of the many helicopters that seem to be so prevalent around here. also thought that it definitely was not the moon! my eyes were very sore and tired for at least 2 weeks afterward. the next morning my daughter whose bedroom window also faces south, commented to me that the previous night had been strange. i asked why. she then told me that she was watching a movie in bed when suddenly white lights moved across her bedroom walls. she did'nt know what to think of it, but was'nt scared even though she realized it could'nt possibly be car lights, because we live halfway up on a mountainside, and our bedrooms are on the second floor. i told her what i had seen. we both concluded that it had to be a ufo. two days later my friend called me and said she had seen a strange white light shining into her bedroom as well. we only live a few hundred yards from each other. told her what we had seen, and we concluded that it was the same night, and around the same time of the night. we realized that the light had been closer than we first thought, because she saw it in a window that faces north! this is not the only weird, unexplainable thing that i have witnessed while living here. however, it took me 8 months to report this event, and i did so because i searched the report database and found an almost identicle report from july 5, 2009. in pa. the witness mentioned a radio station; cat country. that radio station is about 15 to 20 miles from my location. i realize now that i have been following the reports almost daily in search of a story like ours from my area. and i found it this morning. i am reporting this today in hopes of giving someone else who may have seen this event validation about it. also, i am anxious to see if others who witnessed the blinding white lighton the night of july 5, 2009 will feel compelled to report it here.  eventually, i hope to report the other unexplained events that i have witnessed from my mountainside view.
content.summary: Intensely bright white light shining in window facing south 3 witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i just found out this about 2 weeks ago. i took a photo of my friend at a place called mt.Eden where it is placed at auckland city of new zealand. the exact time was dec/08/2009. and 11:08:38 am.
i didn't know i was took an ufo at this time. i've got big surprise.

about 2 weeks ago, i was looking photos that already taken for 3months ago and i saw a strange dot over the right hand corner of the sky. it looks like ufo so i looked the previous photo(14 seconds before the one) but there was nothing at the sky. as you can see the sky was very clean at that time.

can you define this whether it is a ufo or not?
content.summary: I took a photo then i see an ufo

content.detailedDescription:
"we are not alone" says nasa veteran

we all wish for disclosure and once in a while someone comes out of the woodwork and does just that. if you are not familiar with this mans story, (clark c mcclelland) then i suggest you check this out. everyone should know about this.

short quote:
"in 1991, while monitoring a space shuttle mission, in the secret mission control center at the kennedy space center, i was flabbergasted to observe an entity that was eight to nine feet in height in the open space shuttle pay load bay while it was in earth orbit."

full details here.
http://theufologynetwork.Freeforum.Ca/not-alone-says-nasa-veteran-vt451.Html

enjoy.. 
slushpup
content.summary: "we are not alone" says nasa veteran. alien and ufo disclosure.

content.detailedDescription: in west los angeles looking east from 405 freeway not driving i was walking steady red,white, possilbe light blue blinking lights , planes flew by at distance and helicopters fly lower.Object almost at hight of comercial air plane traffic steady not moving for over half hour im not crazy, and not looking for attention caught my eye. as i wrotte this object went up higher and moved inland towards down town possible dessert
content.summary: Blinking lights

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my deck after picking up some taco bell and i looked up for a minute to look at the stars.  i noticed a strange silouhette-like triangle shape out of my peripheral.  i started tracking it with my eyes and noticed there were three dim gray lights in an equilateral triangle formation.  i could not tell if they were connected or separate, but i felt as though it was one craft i was looking at, not three.  if you held a nickel up at arms length it was about as large as the nickel from point to point. the lights moved at a constant rate the whole time, very fast, in a straight line.  i watched it move silently for about 15 seconds until it was behind the optometry building.  i felt both wonderment and fear while i stood there watching it.  this is the second time i have seen a trio of lights in the sky.  it was way too strange.
content.summary: Dim gray lights in equilateral triangle formation moved in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing alone at the bus stop at 8:45 a.M. looking in a southeasterly direction when i spotted a silver sphere streak through the sky at an estimated distance of half a mile and several hundred feet off the ground.  the object was  observed for a brief 2-3 seconds at a 45 degree angle from the horizon and traveling in a clear blue sky.  it was the size of a dime held at arms length and heading in the direction of alexandria, va and the potomac river.  it���s flight path from behind me would have had it traveling over the pentagon. it reflected the sun���s light, and traveled about the same speed that a falling star would be traveling; there was no sound and it simply vanished in flight, not just disappearing over the horizon.  

i hadn���t planned on reporting this except that it seemed very similar to the silver-colored sphere described in case 22347 one hour later in pennsylvania.
content.summary: Silver sphere seen in nothern virginia

content.detailedDescription:
I took the dogs out to do thier business and began doing some sky watching for a bit while they ran around.

morning was almost completely clear, a whispy cloud here and there, about 38-42 degrees. looking southeast about 2 o'clock in the sky. i was looking at a clusters of stars and suddenly saw a starlike object just appear from no-where.

i watched it for a about 20 seconds and it began to move about but not leaving the area of the sky.

i came inside and got my step-son and his friend who had been up all night playing x-box. as i walked back through the house i grabbed our small digital camera that was able to shot video too, but knew from experience that it would not shot hardle a thing at night, but knew that i would have audio.

the boys came to the back door of the sun porch and i pointed it out and right away they saw the movement. i have seen stars in the past that will dance around because of atmosphere., but this was doing alot more. i tried to turn on the camera, but the batteries were dead. we watched for about 1 minute and i decided to go in and find some batteries and in the mean time i woke my wife up and told her.

i returned in less than a minute and started the camera and introduced the boys and we began to detail what we were seeing. during this time we saw flashes near and in the same portion of the sky in blue, greenish and red colors. all during this time too we watched the object brighten and dim quite a few time and move around in all different directions but still stay in the same portion of the sky. we also saw steaks of light go past the area. my wife had joined us but watched the object from inside the sunroom.

the boys decide to go in after about 5 min since they were cold. but i contiuded to observe. i turned the camera off after another few mintes.
went to the bath room and returned to the sun room where my wife was still watching. i started filming again and making some more observation and commenting for i am planning to post this to my youtube account.
after another few minutes i turned the camera off and decided to finish getting ready for work. 

i poked my head out every so often to check on it and during one of these times  i saw the object shoot out a light out the left side, that faded away. it continuded to stay in the same portion of the sky until the sun came up. it stayed bright even though the rest of the stars faded but it disappeared soon after.

when down loading the video from the camera the time i found that the part i recorded in the sunroon didn't. 

how should i feel about this hmmmmmmm...... i don't know because as of now i have seen more ufo's than any one man should see in any life time. and lots of differt types also and differnt activity. i'm motivated to do start making my sightings public.
content.summary: Let out dogs in morning saw a object appear in sky and obseved for long period of time.

content.detailedDescription:
Here another one of my sighting i like to share.
 i keep a dairy on my ufo sighting 

i was on the way to work that morning.
i was driving down commerce street in loudon.
i notice a strange glowing white round  light moving in a distance,
it was moving slow.
but some trees was blocking my view.
  while  i was driving down commerce street.
when i got to the gate at the warehouse.
i got out of my truck to open the gate at the warehouse.
i look over the warehouse.
 i still could see it but it was further away.
then it disappeared.
 after it was gone.
 i open the gate.
 i got back in my truck and drove in the parking lot and park my truck.
i got out of my truck and walk over to the warehouse and open the door.
i walk in the door.
after i got inside of the warehouse .
i cut the burger alarm off .
i stood there a few minutes, then i realize i forgot to put my soft drinks in my cooler.
i walk back out the door.
 i was looking all over the sky.
 while i was walking back to my truck.
i open my truck door and started putting my soft drinks in my cooler.
after i was done putting my soft drinks in my cooler.
  i close my truck door and turn around.
then i was stunned by a light shining down on me,
it made me look up.
the light was pretty high up.
i keep looking up at the light.
then it started to dim down then the light went out.
there was no sound.
i had to get my eyes focus.
i lean over sideway to see if i could see it.
i could see it but i could not make out the shape.
all i could see was a black object moving north.
 there was no lights on it after the light went out  
 then it made a turn,   then  went west.
 i watch it until it went out of  my sight.
the sightings happen around 7:10 am in the morning.
it was not daylight yet but the sky was started to get a little light.
after it was  all over.
 i walk back into the warehouse and went to work
content.summary: A ufo shined a light down on me at the warehouse in the parking lot.

content.detailedDescription: It's happened a few times, i usually forget after it happens, kinda like a dream? i guess is the best way to describe it. but i reported to roger marsh that i had seen a flash of blueish greenish light in the sky. it illuminates the sky for not even a couple of seconds, it can repeat, but there is no consistency to how it occurs. the one night i reported it may have been the forth or fifth time it has happened. now it occurs late at night, and no noise is apparent. just a flashing light, not concentrated in one area, just seemed to brighten the whole sky. i have no idea what it was, and have even forgotten about it, but the last time i saw it, i googled it and that is my story at this time. im in lower bucks county pa anybody with a similar story i'd love to hear it. the feeling when it happens is that of stop, look around, the hair stands up on your arm, and again no logical explanation.
content.summary: Flash of greenish blueish light lasting few seconds, happens 2 to 3 times sporadically every couple months

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my back yard laying back looking at the stars ,the sky was clear not a cloud in the sky and i saw a triangle shaped object with 3 glowing circluar orbs moving very fast from west to the east about 1000 feet up just guessing ,(hard to tell not knowing the actual size of the object)it lasted about 5-10 secs it was silent all i could hear was cars going by.

at about 11:45 another object flew by this one i could not tell if it was one or two ,but they did move like they were two.By flying side by side  moving close to each other and moving away from each other like a helix shape on there course of flight with two glowing diamond shapes.They were moving in a north east direction.This object i stood up and tried to get a better look but by the time i got up it was gone.
content.summary: Seen 3 glowing circles in a triange form the later 2 diamond shape objects
